data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting - May 12, 2023
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of Vedanta Limited ('the Company') at its meeting held today, i.e. May 12, 2023, has considered and approved the Audited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the Fourth Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: In continuation to our Letter No. VEDL/Sec./SE/22-23/181 dated January 17, 2023 and pursuant to Regulation 30(6) and Regulation 46(2)(oa) read with Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the audio/video recording of the Earnings Conference Call on Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022, is available on the website of the Company at www.vedantalimited.com.We request you to kindly take the above on record.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting - January 27, 2023
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of Vedanta Limited ('the Company') at its meeting held today, i.e. January 27, 2023 has considered and approved the Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the Third Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On October 28, 2022
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today, i.e. Oct 28, 2022 have considered and approved the Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the Second Quarter and Half Year ended Sep 30, 2022.

In this regard, please find enclosed herewith the following:
1.Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the Second Quarter and Half Year ended Sep 30, 2022 ('Financial Results');
2.Limited Review Report for Financial Results from our Statutory Auditors, M/s S.R. Batliboi & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants, in terms of Regulation 33 and 52 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations');
The report of Auditors is with unmodified opinion w.r.t. the Financial Results;
3.A Press Release in respect to the Financial Results; and
4.Investor Presentation on the Financial Results.

We request you to please take the above on record.
